definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The major medieval and modern view on the problem of universals other than nominalism.
sentences.chinese: 主要中世紀和現代觀點對問題的共性以外唯名。

sentences.english: Product line architecture can be divided into commonalities and variabilities.
sentences.chinese: 產品線體系結構可分成公共性部分與變化性部分。

sentences.english: The interpretation of the public character of education can only be based on its pedagogic property.
sentences.chinese: 對教育公共性特徵的闡釋，只能依據其教育學屬性。

sentences.english: The study of linguistic universals has become a main stream in modern linguistics.
sentences.chinese: 語言共性研究已成爲現代語言學的一種發展趨勢。

sentences.english: The government unfurls her publicity from aspects of both passiveness and activeness.
sentences.chinese: 在生活世界中政府從消極和積極兩方面展示其公共性。

sentences.english: Then, see if those patterns are generalizable — if everyone has similar patterns.
sentences.chinese: 之後，看看這些腦電圖是否存在一些共性。

sentences.english: On the other hand, Ruby has common elements with all three of these.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，Ruby具有這三門語言的的共性。

sentences.english: There are plenty of common characteristics in noun classifiers of Sino-Tibetan languages.
sentences.chinese: 漢藏語名量詞存在着大量的共性特徵。

sentences.english: Different inns display general character in management. First, they are gradational.
sentences.chinese: 明清時期不同種類的客店在經營中表現出一定的共性。

sentences.english: I learned that true love has some universal qualities and telltale signs.
sentences.chinese: 我也瞭解到真愛是有共性的，也並非無跡可尋。

sentences.english: The paper expounds the implication of culture, the universals and peculiarities of cultures.
sentences.chinese: 本文探討了文化的含義以及不同文化的共性與差異。

sentences.english: There are several things that are common to most ESBs. Some of the most important ones are
sentences.chinese: 大多數ESB產品都有一些共性。

sentences.english: It is a basic course on study machine commonness problem.
sentences.chinese: 它是一門研究機械共性問題的。

sentences.english: Different culture patterns have some commonness to some degree and also the individuality relatively.
sentences.chinese: 文化模式具有一定的共性，但又具有相對的個性。

sentences.english: The distinction between public knowledge and private knowledge actually is just artificial delimits.
sentences.chinese: 知識的私人性與公共性的區分是人爲地劃出來的。

sentences.english: In addition to the common characteristics, there are a lot of differences in Russian and Chinese figurative …
sentences.chinese: 除了共性以外，俄漢喻人詞語還有許多個體差異。
